title: Calories in IPA
meta_description: Discover calories in IPA beer per standard 12 oz serving, including carbs, alcohol impact, and nutrition breakdowns for popular craft brews.
assumptions: Standard 12 oz (355 ml) bottle of India Pale Ale (IPA), ~6.5% ABV, craft brew style with hops and malt; no mixers or garnishes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, ABV, recipe, and serving size. Check labels or brewery info for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A standard 12 oz IPA has about 215 kcal, mostly from alcohol and carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one IPA beer?
faqs.a: About 215 kcal for a standard 12 oz IPA at 6.5% ABV.
Yes, around 18 g carbs per 12 oz serving, from malt sugars.

faqs.q: Does ABV affect calories in IPA?
faqs.a: Higher ABV means more calories; light IPAs have fewer than double IPAs.
